name: To Do: Find the Flag (Easy)
description: A company is testing out their new web based to-do list application, and is soliciting feedback from users to find issues. Use a web browser to connect to the application and take it for a spin. The company knows you're busy, but is hopeful that you will add 'finding the flag' to your to-do list! Connect via [https://server-ip:50443](https://server-ip:50443)
